Konsole is a terminal emulator for the KDE desktop.

sections.title: True-color programs do not display correctly
sections.content:
This is because by default, konsole does not set the right TERM variable. To set it, either edit your konsole profile or make a new one:

```
~/.local/share/konsole/konsole.profile
```

```
[General]
Name=konsole
Environment=TERM=konsole-direct,COLORTERM=truecolor
```
